short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically login in all UPC web services.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension automatically fills and submits UPC's Authentication System (SSO) login form, including the 2FA code. It also redirects Atenea's login page to SSO login page, so you don't have to interact with any login form whatsoever.

Other non SSO supported platforms:
 - e-status
 - LearnSQL2
 - mWiki
 - (Contact me if you need another platform)

NOTE: For this extension to work, you need to previously fill the username and password in the extension's options page. This means the credentials are stored locally without any encryption. Use this extension at your own risk.

NOTE: You can get the 2FA secret from the QR code provided to configure 2FA. Scan the QR code and extract the secret value.
